channel.title: cloud architecture on What Bird Is That?
channel.description: Recent content in cloud architecture on What Bird Is That?

item.title: Architecture Books to Read
item.description: Ahead in the Cloud: Best Practices for Navigating the Future of Enterprise IT by Stephen Orban “Cloud computing is the most significant technology development of our lifetimes. It has made countless new businesses possible and presents a massive opportunity for large enterprises to innovate like startups and retire decades of technical debt. But making the most of the cloud requires much more from enterprises than just a technology change. Stephen Orban led Dow Jones’s journey toward digital agility as their CIO and now leads AWS’s Enterprise Strategy function, where he helps leaders from the largest companies in the world transform their businesses.
